com.mapzen.tangram

Interface TouchInput.ShoveResponder

  • Enclosing class:
    TouchInput

    public static interface TouchInput.ShoveResponder
    Interface for responding to a shove (two-finger vertical drag) gesture

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onShove(float distance)
      Called repeatedly while two touch points are moved together vertically

    • Method Detail

      • onShove

        boolean onShove(float distance)
        Called repeatedly while two touch points are moved together vertically
        Parameters:
        distance - The vertical distance moved by the two touch points relative to the last shoving event, in screen coordinates
        Returns:
        True if the event is consumed, false if the event should continue to propagate
